title: VR-Based Furniture Product Demonstration System Utilization Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic furniture design principles and understanding of virtual environment interfaces
context.additional_context: Enhancing learning design capabilities and operating VR-based product demonstration systems for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and compare the 3D characteristics of furniture products through a VR-based demonstration system.
Learners can explain the user experience (UX) optimization process applying the Taguchi method.
Learners can design furniture product demonstration scenarios in a VR environment and construct evaluation surveys.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
